creator: james.p.williams@sun.com
text:
I'm getting a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError trying to validate a document
against a schema.
I've tried increasing the memory available to 256M, and the error 
still occurs.

I've been able to validate this document successfully against the schema using
XML Turbo, from TIBCOExtensibility, which has XML Schema support
also.

I've seen this happen in 1.4.0 and 1.4.2, which I just downloaded.
I'm using JDK1.3.1 on Solaris 8.

Here are the XML document and schema.
